    • waitListManager

      public void waitListManager​(java.lang.String Name)
      Once the roster is full (holding the specified maximum number of students) any students added subsequently will be added to a second list, the “wait list”. The wait list should not be kept in alphabetic order The program should no longer end when the roster is full. The display command should display both the roster and wait list. Not an override
      Parameters:
      Name - for student

    • waitListBump

      public void waitListBump()
      When a student is removed from a full roster, if there are students on the waitlist, the first student on the waitlist should automatically be added to the roster, placed in correct alphabetical order, and removed from the waitlist. not an override
